name: Animal Fit Brains Trainer freemium memorado kids
name_original: Animal Fit Brains Trainer freemium memorado kids
description:
ANIMAL MEMORY MATCH
===================================================================

=> Animal Memory Match the classic board game, which help develop you memory skills.
=> Playing this game with your friend,relative will help you to improve your recognition while having fun.
=> this game contains amazing sound effects,graphics and animations
=>this game helps every one who want to improve memory in a faster way

INSTRUCTION
===================================================================
Initially you will see all cards turned face down. Tap on one of the card and remember the picture on it. With the next tap try to find and flip the

card with the same picture as previous one. If the pictures on the both memory cards will be the same, your score will increased and you can

continue with the next pair. Otherwise both cards will flip back over and you will get another try. Try to find all matched cards as fast as possible

before the timer runs out


INSIDE ANIMAL MEMORY MATCH GAME
===================================================================
=> 3 Types of level Difficulties
Easy : 240 seconds timer
Medium :180 Seconds timer
Hard : 120 Seconds timer

=> cute sounds and enhanced graphics
=>colorful HD graphic designed for toddlers
=> contains beautiful images of animals
=>visual memory training
=> high score will automatically saved.
=>Optimized with all devices
=>Simple and intuitive interface which is easy to use and easy to play.
